messages.subject: Re: Valerie and The Unprocessed Child
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Kelly, I haven t been to this list to read in weeks. Decided to do some catching up tonight and am so glad I did. I m glad you enjoyed it. And if you
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Kelly,

I haven't been to this list to read in weeks. Decided to do some
catching up tonight and am so glad I did. I'm glad you enjoyed it.
And if you want your own copy <g> I have 4500 copies lining the
walls of my living room right now.

love, Valerie (who is barely over the soreness from unloading that
semi-trailer of books)
http://www.ubpub.com

donation. I read it this
> evening. It's a quick read and should be a MUST in every
Unschooler's
> library. It'll make a great Christmas present for in-laws! <G>

messages.subject: Valerie and The Unprocessed Child
messages.msgSnippet: I want to let everyone know that I just received a copy of Valerie s new book. I wish I could say it s MY copy, but it is a raffle donation. I read it this
messages.messageBody:
I want to let everyone know that I just received a copy of Valerie's new
book. I wish I could say it's MY copy, but it is a raffle donation. I read it this
evening. It's a quick read and should be a MUST in every Unschooler's
library. It'll make a great Christmas present for in-laws! <G>

Congratulations, Valerie!

~Kelly, and I loved the forward by Laurie---so sweet!
